pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Regression Models for Large Datasets using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes // Fits univariate Bayesian spatial regression models for large datasets using Nearest Neighbor Gaussian Processes (NNGP) detailed in Finley, Datta, Banerjee (2022) doi:10.18637/jss.v103.i05, Finley, Datta, Cook, Morton, Andersen, and Banerjee (2019) doi:10.1080/10618600.2018.1537924, and Datta, Banerjee, Finley, and Gelfand (2016) doi:10.1080/01621459.2015.1044091.
